title.label: Ham horn, jam horn, wham bam thank you ma‚Äôam horn.

content.label: If this could be present at peace talks, it would break down all barriers and start moving this world in a positive direction. This app transcends language miscommunications, appealing to all walks of life. If you give this app anything less than 5 stars, that‚Äôs essentially saying you hate world peace. Further testing is required but I theorize that if you play ham horn pointed at a field of crops, they will yield more food and work as a natural pesticide. That would begin the solution to world hunger as well. So now if you don‚Äôt give this app 5 stars, you hate world peace and wish people would starve. Are you happy now? Can you live with yourself?
How does this not have 5 stars!? Such a clean well done app. Does exactly what is needed and no more. I wish I could donate these guys/gals money!
